sequences.name: Commerce Leaders Outreach Sequence
sequences.persona_name: US Small Retail & E-commerce - Commerce Leaders
sequences.objective: Get a short conversation about reducing cart abandonment and centralizing inventory

touches.objective: Introduce high cart abandonment pain point
touches.subject_line: Cut cart abandonment by up to 20%
touches.content_suggestion: Hi {{first_name}}, congrats on {{company}}'s recent momentum — noticed your focus on DTC growth. Many small DTC teams lose revenue from high cart abandonment during checkout flows. Shopify Checkout can reduce abandonment by up to 20% with a faster, secured flow and native fraud protection. Would you be open to a 10-minute call to see where you could recover lost checkout conversions?
touches.hints: Reference a recent sale/launch or product line to show DTC context

touches.objective: Share case study reducing cart abandonment
touches.subject_line: How a DTC brand cut abandonment 18%
touches.content_suggestion: Hi {{first_name}}, I shared a short note — we helped a 25-store DTC brand reduce cart abandonment ~18% by moving to a fast Shopify Checkout and simplifying mobile payment options. Thought it might be relevant as you scale acquisition. Happy to share the 2-min case study?
touches.hints: Mention a similar-sized DTC brand or a product category match

touches.objective: Deep dive on centralized inventory pain and solution
touches.subject_line: Stop stockouts across online + in‑store
touches.content_suggestion: Hi {{first_name}}, small teams often waste hours reconciling separate online and in‑store inventory, causing stockouts and lost sales. Shopify Admin centralizes inventory and orders in one dashboard — clients of similar size cut stockouts ~30% and reclaimed operations hours. If you want, I can highlight two quick changes that typically move the needle in 30 days.
touches.hints: If public info shows in-store presence, reference number of stores or local pickup offers

touches.objective: Direct meeting request to discuss conversion & ops
touches.content_suggestion: Hi {{first_name}}, calling to see if you have 10 minutes this week to talk about reducing cart abandonment and centralizing inventory so your small team spends less time on manual ops and more on growth. What day works best?
touches.hints: Prepare a 10-minute agenda: current checkout metrics, one quick inventory fix, next steps

touches.objective: Breakup with a new angle on acquisition efficiency
touches.subject_line: Lower CAC by finding high-value shoppers
touches.content_suggestion: Hi {{first_name}}, one last note — many small marketing teams struggle to scale paid acquisition and inflate CAC. Shopify Audiences helps identify high-value shopper segments to lower CAC and lift ROAS. If improving paid efficiency is a priority, I can share two examples of optimized audiences in your category.
touches.hints: Point to ad spend constraints or recent paid campaigns (if known)

sequences.name: Apparel Growth Leaders Outreach Sequence
sequences.objective: Schedule a call to standardize inventory/pricing and improve mobile launch conversion

touches.objective: Introduce inconsistent inventory & pricing pain
touches.subject_line: Sync inventory & pricing across channels
touches.content_suggestion: Hi {{first_name}}, saw {{company}} expanding DTC and wholesale channels — many apparel growth teams face inconsistent inventory and pricing across DTC, wholesale, and retail. Shopify Admin + POS keep inventory and pricing in sync in real time, which reduces channel conflicts and lost sales during launches. Interested in a quick chat on how that would map to your channels?
touches.hints: Reference any wholesale partner or retail store counts if available

touches.objective: Share insight about market entry complexity
touches.subject_line: Faster market launches with localized pricing
touches.content_suggestion: Hi {{first_name}}, growth teams often stall entering new markets due to duties and local payments. Shopify Markets centralizes pricing, duties and payments — brands we've worked with cut time‑to‑launch in new countries by weeks. Happy to share a quick example?
touches.hints: If brand has international sales, mention specific target market

touches.objective: Deep dive on mobile checkout friction during product drops
touches.subject_line: Improve mobile conversion on product drops
touches.content_suggestion: Hi {{first_name}}, apparel launches often lose conversions on mobile during drops. Shopify Checkout optimizes mobile payments and fraud protection so high-traffic launches convert at higher rates. One apparel brand increased launch-day conversion by 12% after switching. Want a 10‑minute review of your last drop metrics?
touches.hints: If the brand runs drops, reference last launch date or a specific campaign

touches.objective: Direct meeting request to review launch and channel sync
touches.content_suggestion: Hi {{first_name}}, quick call to review mobile checkout performance on your last drop and how synced inventory/pricing could improve launch ROI — do you have 10 minutes this week?
touches.hints: Offer two specific time windows and mention you'll bring one relevant customer example

touches.objective: Follow-up with a short case example
touches.subject_line: Example: 12% lift on launch conversion
touches.content_suggestion: Hi {{first_name}}, following up — here's a short example of an apparel brand that saw a 12% lift on drop conversion and removed pricing mismatches across channels with Shopify Admin. If you'd like, I can send the 2-minute read or hop on a quick call.
touches.hints: Attach or link to a 1–2 paragraph case snippet about an apparel client

sequences.name: Omnichannel Ops Outreach Sequence
sequences.objective: Secure a discovery to discuss unifying payments, tax compliance, and ERP syncs

touches.objective: Introduce lack of unified payments & reconciliation pain
touches.subject_line: Unify online + in‑store payments and reconciliation
touches.content_suggestion: Hi {{first_name}}, I noticed {{company}} operates many stores in CA — enterprise ops teams commonly lack a unified payment and reconciliation flow across thousands of stores and online, which increases reconciliation time and errors. Shopify POS with Shopify Payments unifies payments and reduces reconciliation effort across channels. Would you be open to a short call to review your reconciliation pain points?
touches.hints: If store counts are public, cite the number of stores or regions

touches.objective: Share credibility on tax & duty compliance automation
touches.subject_line: Reduce international tax & duty audit risk
touches.content_suggestion: Hi {{first_name}}, global expansion teams face compliance gaps that increase audit exposure. Shopify Tax automates regional tax and duty calculations at checkout to reduce compliance risk. I can share how an enterprise retailer lowered audit exceptions by standardizing tax logic.
touches.hints: Reference any cross-border selling initiatives or marketplaces the company uses

touches.objective: Deep dive on slow ERP integrations and fulfillment SLAs
touches.subject_line: Speed up ERP syncs and avoid fulfillment misses
touches.content_suggestion: Hi {{first_name}}, legacy ERP integrations often cause slow data syncs and inventory mismatch, degrading fulfillment SLAs. Using Shopify's GraphQL Admin API, enterprises reduce data sync latency and cut mismatch rates — improving fulfillment reliability. If you have 15 minutes, I can walk through one integration pattern we've used at scale.
touches.hints: Call out specific ERPs if known (e.g., Oracle, SAP) to show technical fit

touches.objective: Direct meeting request to discuss ops improvements
touches.content_suggestion: Hi {{first_name}}, can we book a 20-minute call to review reconciliation, tax automation, and ERP sync patterns that other enterprise retailers used to cut reconciliation time and reduce fulfillment misses? Which day this week works?
touches.hints: Be ready to propose a 20-minute agenda and a technical stakeholder to join

touches.objective: Add social proof with an enterprise case study
touches.subject_line: Enterprise case: unified payments + faster syncs
touches.content_suggestion: Hi {{first_name}}, quick share — an enterprise retailer standardized payments and lowered reconciliation exceptions by consolidating on Shopify POS + Payments and rearchitecting syncs with GraphQL Admin API. If helpful, I can share the one-page summary.
touches.hints: Tag or reference a well-known enterprise client (if public) to build credibility

touches.objective: Breakup with an ROI recap for ops leaders
touches.subject_line: ROI recap: reconciliation, tax, ERP syncs
touches.content_suggestion: Hi {{first_name}}, last note — teams that unify payments, automate tax, and speed ERP syncs typically see measurable drops in reconciliation time and fulfillment SLA misses. If you'd like the ROI worksheet we use for ops leaders, I can send it over. Otherwise I'll close the loop.
touches.hints: Offer to send an ROI worksheet or short technical architecture doc

sequences.name: Platform Engineering Outreach Sequence
sequences.persona_name: Global Large B2B SaaS - Platform Eng
sequences.objective: Book a technical call on headless storefronts, Functions API, and API efficiency

touches.objective: Introduce the pain of rebuilding commerce primitives
touches.subject_line: Ship headless storefronts faster with Hydrogen
touches.content_suggestion: Hi {{first_name}}, saw {{company}} investing in developer-first experiences — platform teams often rebuild commerce primitives instead of reusing them, which slows delivery. Hydrogen provides a developer-first headless storefront framework that accelerates checkout integrations without rebuilding core commerce. Can we schedule a 20‑minute technical walkthrough?
touches.hints: Reference the engineering blog or recent platform announcement to show relevance

touches.objective: Share Functions API use case for complex pricing rules
touches.subject_line: Run custom commerce logic inside the platform
touches.content_suggestion: Hi {{first_name}}, for custom pricing and complex commerce rules many teams run external services. Functions API lets you run that logic inside Shopify, removing external servers and maintenance overhead. Happy to share an example where this cut ops work and latency.
touches.hints: Reference common pain of external infra for commerce logic (latency, ops burden)

touches.objective: Deep dive on inefficient store data requests and API traffic
touches.subject_line: Reduce API traffic and speed store syncs
touches.content_suggestion: Hi {{first_name}}, we see inefficient store data requests drive high API traffic and slow syncs for fleets of stores. The GraphQL Admin API enables more efficient reads/writes and batching patterns to reduce requests and speed operations. If you're open, I can share specific GraphQL patterns we've used at scale.
touches.hints: If they publish metrics about request volume or latency, mention them briefly

touches.objective: Direct request for a technical discovery call
touches.content_suggestion: Hi {{first_name}}, can we set a 20-minute technical call to review Hydrogen, Functions API, and GraphQL patterns to reduce API traffic and maintenance overhead? I can bring a solutions engineer to make it concrete.
touches.hints: Suggest specific times and note you'll share a short architecture diagram in advance

touches.objective: Provide social proof with an engineering case study
touches.subject_line: Engineering case: cut API calls, speed syncs
touches.content_suggestion: Hi {{first_name}}, following up — one large SaaS platform reduced API calls by 40% and shortened sync latencies by reworking to GraphQL Admin patterns and Functions. If helpful, I can send the architecture summary or set a demo.
touches.hints: Offer to include code snippets or performance numbers for credibility

touches.objective: Breakup with an offer of a technical sandbox
touches.subject_line: Offer: 2‑week sandbox for Functions/Hydrogen
touches.content_suggestion: Hi {{first_name}}, last outreach — if a live proof of concept helps, we can spin up a short sandbox to validate Hydrogen or Functions API with one of your flows. If that's of interest, I can coordinate resources and a 2‑week plan.
touches.hints: Mention required stakeholders (SRE, backend eng) and expected outcomes for the sandbox

sequences.name: Wholesale Ops Leaders Outreach Sequence
sequences.persona_name: North America Mid-Market Wholesale - Ops Leaders
sequences.objective: Arrange a call to reduce manual order processing and streamline invoicing/payments

touches.objective: Introduce manual B2B order processing pain
touches.subject_line: Cut manual wholesale order processing ~50%
touches.content_suggestion: Hi {{first_name}}, many mid-market wholesale ops teams process high volumes of manual B2B orders, causing fulfillment delays and higher labor costs. Shopify Admin centralizes wholesale orders and accounts and can cut manual processing time by ~50%. Would you be open to a quick call to see where the manual bottlenecks are?
touches.hints: Reference order volumes or number of account managers if available

touches.objective: Share solution for invoicing and net-term payments
touches.subject_line: Integrate invoicing + payments for faster collections
touches.content_suggestion: Hi {{first_name}}, account managers often struggle with invoicing and net‑term payments which slows collections. Shopify Payments plus apps from the App Store enable integrated invoicing and payments to speed collections and reduce disputes. I can share a short example if helpful.
touches.hints: If you know they offer net terms, reference typical DSO challenges

touches.objective: Deep dive on shipping costs and multi-location fulfillment complexity
touches.subject_line: Lower shipping costs with consolidated fulfillment
touches.content_suggestion: Hi {{first_name}}, shipping costs and multi‑location fulfillment inflate margins and lead times for wholesale. Shopify Shipping provides carrier discounts and consolidated label management to lower fulfillment costs and simplify multi-location fulfillment. Want to review one approach that reduced per-order shipping by a mid-market wholesaler we work with?
touches.hints: If they use multiple warehouses, mention how consolidated label management could help

touches.objective: Direct meeting request to map ops improvements
touches.content_suggestion: Hi {{first_name}}, do you have 15 minutes to map current manual order flows and invoicing pain points? I can share specific steps other wholesale ops teams took to reduce processing time and improve cash collection.
touches.hints: Offer a brief 15-minute audit call and state you'll prepare one tailored recommendation

touches.objective: Follow-up with a client result focused on fulfillment ROI
touches.subject_line: Result: faster fulfillment & lower shipping spend
touches.content_suggestion: Hi {{first_name}}, one more note — a mid-market wholesaler consolidated fulfillment and invoicing flows and saw measurable drops in processing time and shipping spend. If you'd like, I can send the 1-page ROI example or schedule a quick walkthrough.
touches.hints: Include a one-paragraph ROI snapshot or percent improvements for credibility
